name: Raising Hands
baseMeaning: Two hands raised in the air, typically in celebration.
tldr: Celebration, praise, or 'hallelujah!' - expressing joy or triumph.

contextMeanings.meaning: Celebrating good news or an accomplishment.
Celebrating team wins or good news.

platformNotes.note: Very common for celebrating team achievements.
Used for enthusiastic agreement or celebration.
Common in celebratory posts and comments.

generationalNotes.note: Standard celebration emoji, sometimes used ironically.
Go-to for expressing excitement or victory.
May interpret as praise hands or hallelujah.
